# Rainbow Road

This is a [Country Road](https://puzz.link/rules.html?country) with the additional constraint that for each paired red, blue, and yellow portals, for each square the road passes in one portal, the same square in the other portal of the same color must have the same road but rotated 180 degrees.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2022/rainbowRoad1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
